name: .P7M File Extension
summary: Learn about .P7M files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open P7M files in Cryptigo p7mViewer (Windows). If your P7M file contains an email that was only signed using S/MIME, you can open the file without a private key. If your P7M file contains an email encrypted using S/MIME, you need the private key used to encrypt the file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
